name: Paraiba International
overview:
The Leading Internet E-Tailor and Importer of fine gemstones, Paraiba International welcomes you to our website. Here you will find stunning and extraordinary gems from all over the world. Our loose stone and custom design work can provide you with one-of-a-kind pieces of stunning brilliance and artisan craftsmanship.

Paraiba International is based in New York and is an importer of magnificent gemstones from around the world. Paraiba International offers extraordinary value at affordable prices on loose Tanzanite gemstones, Paraiba Tourmaline, Aquamarine and Sapphires. Uniquely colored gemstones such as the Mandarin Garnet and the Watermelon Tourmaline provide you with spectacular custom jewelry options. All of this is offered with a 100% Money Back Guarantee.

Whether you are looking for fashion statements, marvelous new gifts or investment pieces, Paraiba International can design just the right piece with a beautiful gemstone garnered from all over the world. Look for more information on our site about gemstone options, our authentication, certification and guarantee program as well as online jewelry and design options. Our precious collection of Paraiba Tourmaline, Rubellite, Tsavorite and Garnets are spectacular as is our wonderful collection of Tanzanite gemstones of assorted size and shape.
